dits.title: pull, bare pull
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 4 (tests/fail.dit)
pull
   ^

SyntaxError: Expected name to pull from linked dit

dits.title: pull, directly 'pull from'
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 6 (tests/fail.dit)
pull from
     ^

SyntaxError: Expected name to pull from linked dit

dits.title: pull, name but no 'from' or ','
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 15 (tests/fail.dit)
pull JavaScript
              ^

SyntaxError: Expected 'from' or ',' to follow target

dits.title: pull, 'as' but no name
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 18 (tests/fail.dit)
pull JavaScript as
                 ^

SyntaxError: Expected name to replace target name

dits.title: pull, 'as' name but no 'from' or ','
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 21 (tests/fail.dit)
pull JavaScript as JS
                    ^

SyntaxError: Expected 'from' or ',' to follow target

dits.title: pull, full 'as', but no extra name
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 22 (tests/fail.dit)
pull JavaScript as JS,
                     ^

SyntaxError: Expected name to pull from linked dit

dits.title: pull, 'as NAME from', but no link
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 26 (tests/fail.dit)
pull JavaScript as JS from
                         ^

SyntaxError: Expected a filepath string for import

dits.title: pull, no link
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 20 (tests/fail.dit)
pull JavaScript from
                   ^

SyntaxError: Expected a filepath string for import

dits.title: pull, duplicate target
dits.expected:
Line: 2 Col: 6 (tests/fail.dit)
pull JavaScript from
     ^

SyntaxError: 'JavaScript' has already been declared

dits.title: pull, duplicate replacement
dits.dit:
String JS = 'cat';
pull JavaScript as JS from
dits.expected:
Line: 2 Col: 20 (tests/fail.dit)
pull JavaScript as JS from
                   ^

SyntaxError: 'JS' has already been declared

dits.title: pull, target not found
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 38 (tests/fail.dit)
pull nonsense from 'tests/import.dit';
                                     ^

SyntaxError: 'nonsense' is not a valid member of this dit

dits.title: pull, 2 targets, second one is dup
dits.dit:
String test = 'cat';
pull JavaScript, test from
dits.expected:
Line: 2 Col: 18 (tests/fail.dit)
pull JavaScript, test from
                 ^

SyntaxError: 'test' has already been declared

dits.title: pull, 2 targets w/ replacements, second one is dup
dits.dit:
String test = 'cat';
pull JavaScript as JS, thing as test from
dits.expected:
Line: 2 Col: 33 (tests/fail.dit)
pull JavaScript as JS, thing as test from
                                ^

SyntaxError: 'test' has already been declared

dits.title: pull, 2 target success
pull, replacement success
dits.dit:
pull message1 as mes from 'tests/lang1.dit';
print(mes);

dits.title: pull, 2 target success
